desc: At Alldoer, For Curls, our mission is to continue to be a 100% Curl-Friendly Brand. We will passionately strive to ensure Wavies, Curlies, Coilies, and Kinkies of every gender get familiar with and fall in love with their curls, to nourish and care for them with our natural-based products, making curly life hassle-free
